title: SMALL GROUPS BETTER UNDERSTAND
description: Youtube, Telegram and others are unpersonal. Talking about money, world changes or new horizon must be discussed face to face
solution: Create here, in Moudon - Switzerland, a CardaSatellite point. Organize real live chats, in small groups to share ideas or fears of future
experience: Live discussions give more confidence than on the web for many people: I personnaly convinced 10 people around me to invest in crypto, ADA.
